relatedRecords.description: NDC TechTown 31 Aug - 3 Sept 2020. Conference for software developers focusing on software development for products. IoT /Embedded /C++ . relatedRecords.name: NE RPC
relatedRecords.description: NE RPC is a community-organised, free-to-attend virtual conference, showcasing speakers from the North East of England. We’ll be hosting a day of 30-minute talks, covering a wide variety of tech subjects. Whether bleeding-edge or tried-and-tested, we’re listening!
